title: Image Search
description: Bootcamp front end project that allows users to search for a location and find its weather and images, along with a map of the location.

title: Rutgers Flyers
description: Collaborative project that uses the Google Places API to show restaurants, bars, and places to study around the Rutgers campus in New Brunswick, NJ.  This project shows user reviews, hours of operation, and price rating.

title: French Learner's Guide
description: My first site. I created the French Learner's Guide as a learning supplement to assist both students and travelers gain a better understanding of the language.
